<base target="_parent">

```{r}
tryCatch(
    plot_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/LUMCON_ODOTCOMM18/blob/master/data/drums_nmfs.csv",
        title   = "Commercial Red and Black Drum Landings",
        y_label = "Pounds",
        skip    = 0,
        filter  = NULL,
        col_t   = "Year",
        col_y   = "Pounds",
        group_by= "Species"
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
